I would not purchase these for long term use. They are very cheap. The fabric was see through and very stiff feeling. After two washes, they got these giant dark spots on them that we couldn't get rid of for anything. We bleached them, used Oxiclean, nothing worked. Luckily, my fiancée only needed them while he was in his training period for his new job, so we threw them away when we were done with them. If you only need them for a temporary purpose (such as a costume), it works fine. Other than that, find a better quality product.

I have to wear a plain good old fashion bland gray shirt for work. If you’re asking why, well the boss likes to be ‘classy!’ Her words! Anyway this gray blend of wrinkle free, when wet dries quickly full of gray life works. I should note it runs big. I’m a normal medium in men’s, I like it to cover my backside lol but bought a large in case I shrunk it. It did not shrink at all after 3 washes and 3 drys on gentle. It hasn’t pulled at all from rubbing against the coffee counter I work at and the color has stayed its lovely shade of gray. Buy the shirt at a great price and by your natural size unless you like room then size up!
